document_data.name: Esmel Torlath II
document_data.mainbody: King '''Esmel Torlath II''' was an early [[Amn]]ian monarch of the [[Torlath]] dynasty who had a tragic reign.
document_data.Relationships: Esmel was the first son of King [[Corl Torlath I]], and [[Marcos Vymmar]] was his wife's father. [[Esmel Torlath III|Esmel III]] was his second son. His brother Prince [[Ereskas Torlath|Ereskas]] bore the family blade ''[[Namarra]]'' north to found [[Mirabar]].
document_data.History: Esmel's wife and their eldest son disappeared in the {{YearlinkName|600}} when the realm of [[Minsorran]] was destroyed by [[Icehauptannarthanyx]]. He died of grief the following year, putting his younger son Esmel III on the throne at a young age under the regency of his father-in-law Marcos Vymmar.
